title: 签名支持艾未未的网址－
content:
签名支持艾未未的网址

* 所罗门-R-古根海姆基金会 Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation 发起国际声援艾未未签名 http://www.change.org/petitions/call-for-the-release-of-ai-weiwei
    签名网页为英文，可以参考中文说明
        http://goo.gl/ZQm8J = http://loveaiww.blogspot.com/2011/04/blog-post_2477.html
        http://goo.gl/dWt0c = https://profiles.google.com/u/0/changsimeng/posts/GGq9GG4bquE

* 比安卡-雅格 人权基金会要求立即释放艾未未的国际签名 Bianca Jagger Human Rights Foundation Appeals For The Immediate Release of Ai Weiwei
    http://bit.ly/eLG73i = http://www.thepetitionsite.com/1/bianca-jagger-human-rights-foundation-appeals-for-the-immediate-release-of-ai-weiwei/

* email 签名 https://profiles.google.com/u/0/102361906326393874226/buzz

* 另一个 email 签名 http://chinajsm.blogspot.com/2011/04/blog-post_2005.html
    http://goo.gl/YxpSB = https://profiles.google.com/u/0/changsimeng/posts/g77p4Qf6LrC

* 我们都是艾未未！全球1，000，000人签名要求释放艾未未！ http://www.facebook.com/freeaiweiweiasap
